title: [机械][娱乐]Infernal Mobs——地狱般的怪物[1.8.1-1.8.7]
author: 魔末
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:23 编辑 


Infernal Mobs——地狱般的怪物

[pumpkin]介绍[pumpkin]

这个插件可以自动生成一些地狱般的怪物（小boss）
而且还可以自由编辑生成的怪物
而且可编辑项目十分的多，且拥有许多属性（我懒得做汉化版本了，太大了）


[pumpkin]属性[pumpkin]

Poisonous: 有毒的：攻击可以让玩家进入中毒状态
Armoured: 装甲：给小BOSS全套钻石（这还叫小BOSS？当然，大BOSS可以全套附魔钻石=-=）
Blinding: 至盲：可以给玩家造成视野很短的效果（忘记这叫啥了）
Withering: 凋零：给玩家造成凋零效果（持续扣血，这和中毒的区别是，中毒至少会保留1滴血，而凋零是一张扣一段时间，而且凋零血图标会变黑）
Tosser: 不懂
Thief: 小偷：会有几率偷取玩家背包里东西（我的钻石啊！！{:10_498:}）
Quicksand: 缓慢：给玩家造成迟缓效果
Bullwark: 弱化:减少玩家的伤害（应该吧==）
Rust: 锈化：玩家的装备耐久损失更快（要多装备几把武器了）
Sapper: 饥饿：给玩家饥饿效果（加快扣饥饿值的速度）
1up: 多血：有两条命(摧残人们的希望）
Cloaked: 隐身：看不见这个生物（小心你的背后
Ender: 末影之力：可以瞬移（其实我也不确定，那个末影之力是我自己想的一个名字）
Ghastly: 烈焰人效果：可以发射火球
Lifesteal: 吸血:对别人造成伤害，自己加血（原文好像不是这个样子，我是根据名字解释的）
Sprint: 飞毛腿：跑得快
Storm:闪电：像上帝一样弄一道闪电劈向玩家
Webber: 吐丝：在一个玩家脚下生成蜘蛛网
Vengeance: 复仇：自己扣血对方也扣血（有高伤害少血的玩家要小心了=-=）
Weakness: 弱点：猜不出来了QAQ。
Berserk: 狂暴：应该是自己扣血更快，但攻击更高
Explode: 爆炸：死亡后爆炸
Potions: 药水：会向玩家丢有害的药水，像女巫一样
Mama: 孕妇：有可能会
Molten: 火焰抗性：免疫火、岩浆
Archer: 随机发射箭（很可能不是这个）
Necromancer: 死灵法师：会召唤骷髅
Firework: 烟花：烟花爆炸时攻击（感觉也翻译不对）
Gravity: 重力：让我一个玩家飞起来（带你装逼带你飞）
Flying: 飞行：可以飞
Mounted: 骑乘：可以骑在另外一个怪物身上
Morph: 变身：可以变成另外一个怪物
Ghost:不懂
Confusing: 混乱：给玩家造成混乱效果

战利品：好像是可以下载到的，也可以是自己做


[pumpkin]命令and权限[pumpkin]

/im help 帮助
/im reload 重载插件/im info/im getloot <index>/im spawn <mobname> <能力1> <能力2> <能力3> .../im cspawn <怪物> <世界> <x> <y> <z> <能力1> <能力2> ... /im abilities/im showAbilities权限：infernal_mobs.commands:允许使用所有指令
[pumpkin]不兼容插件[pumpkin]
- LeveledMobs v15.0
- MobArena v0.96.6
- 任何插件 (比如 MCMMO采用积分版的可能会出一些毛病
[pumpkin]配置[pumpkin]
chance: 100(怪物变成小BOSS的几率，好像是越小几率越大）levelChance:  3: 1  4: 2  5: 3  6: 4  7: 5namePrefix: "&fInfernal"levelPrefixs:  3: "&fMad"  4: "&fRabid"  5: "&fGiant"  6: "&fKing"  7: "&fInfernal"nameTagsLevel: 1nameTagsName: "&f<prefix> <mobName>"（<prefix>指前缀<mobName>指怪物名字）bossBarsName: "&fLevel <mobLevel> &f<prefix> <mobName>"#bossBarsName: "&f<prefix> <abilities><mobName>"enableBossBar: falseenableScoreBoard: falseshowHealthOnScoreBoard: true#effectAllPlayerAttacks means that for example if the player damages a mob with the poison#power the player will be poisoned no mater how he did it, even if he was using a bow.effectAllPlayerAttacks: trueenableParticles: trueenableDeathMessages: true#A message from this list will be chosen randomly, player=Player's name, mob=Mob type, weapon=Weapon player is holding.deathMessages:   - "&cplayer &chas killed an mob&c!"  - "&cAn mob &cwas slain by player&c!"  - "&cplayer &cowned an mob&c!"  - "&cAn mob &cwas beheaded by player&c's weapon!"  - "&cplayer&c's weapon &ckilled an mob&c!"  - "&cAn mob &cwas killed by player &cusing a weapon&c!"#spawnMessageRadius is the distance around the mob that players will get the message. -1 is everyone in that world, -2 is everyone on the server.enableSpawnMessages: falsespawnMessageRadius: 25#A message from this list will be chosen randomly when a mob spawns, mob=Mob type.spawnMessages:   - "&cAn Infernal mob has spawned near you!"enabledworlds:（地狱怪物所出现的世界，<all>代表所有世界）  - <all>enabledmobs:（能成为地狱搬的怪物的列表）  - PigZombie  - Skeleton  - Zombie  - Spider  - LavaSlime  - Witch  - Wolf  - Creeper  - Ghast  - Giant  - EnderDragon  - WitherBoss  - Bat  - MushroomCow  - Cow  - Sheep  - Pig  - Chicken  - SnowMan  - Ozelot  - EntityHorse  - CaveSpider  - SilverFish  - Blaze  - Enderman  - Slime  - Squid  - VillagerGolem  - WitherSkeleton#Set a ability to false to disable it.poisonous: truearmoured: trueblinding: truewithering: truetosser: truethief: truequicksand: truebullwark: truerust: truesapper: true1up: truecloaked: trueender: trueghastly: truelifesteal: truesprint: truestorm: truewebber: truevengeance: trueweakness: trueberserk: trueexplode: truepotions: truemama: truemolten: truearcher: truenecromancer: truefirework: truegravity: trueflying: truemounted: alwaysmorph: trueghost: trueconfusing: true#Power configuration:mamaSpawnAmount: 3vengeanceDamage: 6berserkDamage: 3moltenBurnLength: 5gravityLevitateLength: 6horseMountsHaveSaddles: truearmouredMountsHaveArmour: truefireworkColour:     red: 255    green: 10    blue: 10mobParticles:   - "lavaSpark:1:10"#mountFate is what will happen to mounts when their infernal master/rider dies, you can put: nothing, death, removal.mountFate: nothingenabledMounts:   - Spider  - MushroomCow  - Cow  - Sheep  - Pig  - EntityHorse  - Slime  - GhastenabledRiders:   - PigZombie  - Skeleton  - Zombie  - Witch  - Creeper  - SnowMan  - Enderman  - WitherSkeletondisabledBabyMobs:   - Wolf  - MushroomCow  - Cow  - Sheep  - Pig  - Chicken  - Ozelot  - EntityHorse#The min/max amount of powers that a mob will get.#NOTE: the amount of enabled powers must not be less than the maxpowers.#healthMultiplier is what number the infernal mobs health will be multiplied by.#If you have healthByPower enabled then healthMultiplier and healthByDistance will do nothing.#dropChance is the chance a dead mob will drop loot, the lower the higher the chance (min 1)#xpMultiplier is what the normal xp a mob drops will be multiplied by.#healthByDistance makes mobs HP go up as you go further from the world spawn.#Every addDistance blocks the mobs will get healthToAdd times how far they are HP.minpowers: 3maxpowers: 7healthMultiplier: 4healthByPower: falsehealthByDistance: falsehealthToAdd: 5addDistance: 200enableDrops: truedropChance: 1xpMultiplier: 8enableFarmingDrops: true

Here is an example loot.yml
#Potions are applied to players who have all the required items every 10 seconds.#The potion lasts for 10 seconds so you get the effect as long as you have the items.potionEffects:    1:      potion: "HEAL"      level: 2      requiredItems:        - 1        - 2    2:      potion: "FIRE_RESISTANCE"      level: 1      requiredItems:        - 3loot:    1:      item: 267      amount: "1-2"      durability: "60-90"      name: "&6Excalibur <itemName>"      mobs:        - PigZombie        - Zombie      powersMin: 1      powersMax: 7      lore1: "&eThe sword of the Righteous,"      lore2: "&eUse only for good!"      minEnchantments: 2      maxEnchantments: 4      enchantments:         1:          enchantment: DAMAGE_UNDEAD          level: 6          chance: 1        2:          enchantment: LOOT_BONUS_MOBS          level: "1-2"          chance: 50        3:          enchantment: DAMAGE_ALL          level: "3-5"          chance: 50        4:          enchantment: DAMAGE_ARTHROPODS          level: "1-6"          chance: 75    2:      item: 261      amount: 1      durability: 100      name: "&4Justice Bow"      mobs:        - Skeleton      lore1: "&cThe bow of Justice."      lore2: "&cSteal from the rich,"      lore3: "&cand give to the poor!"      enchantments:         1:          enchantment: ARROW_INFINITE          level: 1        2:          enchantment: ARROW_FIRE          level: 2    3:      item: 373      amount: 1      durability: 16452      name: "&5Potion of badness"      mobs:        - Witch      lore1: "&dToo many potions"      enchantments:         1:          enchantment: LOOT_BONUS_MOBS          level: 4    4:      commans:         - "give player 264 3"        - "say player got some diamonds!"

（几乎全部看不懂啊，求翻译）
